title: DEVELOPMENT AND CLINICAL VALIDATION OF A GENERATIVE AI ASSISTED MEDICATION-INDICATION KNOWLEDGE BASE
details: F Ma, A Beattie, L Zhang, S Deshpande, M Ficarelli…
abstract: Information on medication-indication relations is extensively used in biomedical research and pharmacoepidemiology. Existing knowledge bases are limited by their insufficient representation of actual clinical practice or are challenging to access and …
